attributes.action: PM to ditch Lib Dems and call General Election
attributes.additional_details: The Lib Dems' disproportionate influence is preventing the Conservatives from representing the country's best interests in opposing the EU's ever-increasing interference in the British way of life. Ditching them should be the first step towards reclaiming our independence by quitting the EU as presently constituted in favour of a return to the original concept of "trade only".
